direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve checking the presence or validity of a validator action.
Both methods interact with the ResultStatus object to retrieve validation-related information.
Both methods modify the state of the ValidatorResult by adding or checking validation results.
The validate method in the Field class performs validation similar to the isValid method, but on a broader scope.

enhanced_by.reason: The add method initializes the validation results that the isValid method checks.
The validate method in the Field class should be invoked before checking the validity of a validator action.
The getResult method can be used to retrieve detailed validation results for assertions after checking validity.
